title: First PR! üöÄ
subtitle: Everyone add their name and experience their first PR! üí•
noOneJoined: No one has joined yet. Be the first! üöÄ
footerText: üí° This repository is a simple frontend project designed for beginners who want to learn Git.
conflictDescription: Since everyone edits the same users.json file, merge conflicts are inevitable! This way you'll experience real conflict resolution.

step1.title: 1. Fork Repository
step1.description: Fork the project to your GitHub account

step2.title: 2. Clone Locally
step2.description: Download the forked project to your computer

step3.title: 3. Edit users.json File
step3.description: Add only your name to the END of users.json file

step4.title: 4. Commit Changes
step4.command: git add . && git commit -m 'feat: add [your-name] to users list'

step5.title: 5. Create Pull Request
step5.description: Open PR to merge into main repository
